sentences.sentence: It is spread by the bite of an infected tsetse fly (Glossina Genus), a species native to the African continent.
sentences.translation: 它通过非洲大陆当地特有的物种即受感染的采采蝇(舌蝇属)的叮咬传播。

sentences.sentence: They are transmitted to humans by tsetse fly (Glossina genus) bites which have acquired their infection from human beings or from animals harbouring the human pathogenic parasites.
sentences.translation: 它们通过被携带人类致病寄生虫的人类或动物感染的采采蝇(舌蝇属)叮咬传播给人类。
